node.data: {"title":"Apartment Méhes","descp":"Apartment Méhes is a 2 storey, 5 bedroom apartment, only a 15-minute-walk away from Lake Bánk, welcoming a maximum number of 12 people, available for rent throughout the whole year.","home":"Home","gallery":"Gallery","info":"Information","contact":"Contact"}

{"page":"Home","slogan":"Tranquility, nature, relaxation.","description":"Apartment Méhes is a 2 storey, 5 bedroom apartment, only a 15-minute-walk away from Lake Bánk, welcoming a maximum number of 12 people, available for rent throughout the whole year.\nIn the summer a fire pit and an outdoor cookhouse, in the winter an enormous cozy living room with a fireplace and TV pleases the ones seeking relaxation - while those who can't get away from work are still able to get things done thanks to the wireless internet connection in the house.\nEvery room has it's own bathroom for maximum comfort, requesting no bedding is possible - with a reduction to the price of course."}
